strong.span:
Whitewater Unified School District is closing effective immediately (March 15) due to the COVID-19 outbreak.
Information on the District's COVID-19 response and community information can be found here:

br.span: For more information on how WUSD is helping out, take a look at our WUSD Cares website:
At-Home Learning Documents can be found here:
El Distrito Escolar Unificado de Whitewater está cerrando en vigencia inmediatamente debido al brote de COVID-19.

img.alt: District staff and community members band together to provide meals for students during the COVID-19 health emergency.
Students participate in Breakfast with Santa and the Parade of Lights.
WMS Celebrates Veterans Day by hosting Veterans.
All buildings at WUSD have been designed ADAM HeartSafe. Pictured is each building receiving their banner.
WUSD staff gearing up for school during the annual data retreat.
District staff at the City Market with new WMS Principal Chris Fountain.
